channel.title: Save On The Persol PO2965V
channel.description: Giuseppe Ratti, an Italian optician from Turin, wanted to design and create glasses for pilots and sports drivers; glasses with strength for maximum protection. So he created the ‘Protectors’. Designed for those that needed to see with optimum clarity and comfort, as well as safety to protect the delicate eyes needed in both professions. Military [...]
